5947: Tom Swift becomes infuriated with Mr. Shallock Peters when he will not sell some of his inventions.
12164: The text does not explicitly state that the Mark was divided into sections. However, it is mentioned that the Markmen were divided into three kindreds: the Wolfings, the Beamings, the Elkings, the Galtings, the Hartings, the Vallings, the Alftings, the Laxings, the Oselings, and the Bearings.
23148: At the Restaurant du Vingtieme Siecle in Greek Street, near Soho Square.
33068: Lieutenant Shane Wolfe is assigned to rescue Professor Charles Plummer.
38322: The men know the spaceship has ended its voyage because it has stopped moving, having traveled past the Satellite Station without any signs of life or activity.
42586: The Inca was disguised as Captain Duval.
16886: The Gyro Captain is killed by the Humungus, the leader of the Marauders, with a magnum.44 bullet to the right foot.
